thread.title: Piers Morgan Just Played Himself On Twitter Thanks To JK Rowling
thread.title_full: Piers Morgan Just Played Himself On Twitter Thanks To JK Rowling

author: Christian Zamora
title: Piers Morgan Just Played Himself On Twitter Thanks To JK Rowling
text:
View this image ›
Twitter: @jk_rowling ID: 10530795 2. And because it’s JK Rowling, her obsessor Piers Morgan couldn’t help himself from joining in on the conversation and fell right into her trap: View this image ›
Twitter: @piersmorgan ID: 10530841 3. Well, if we back up a bit to 2010, turns out the writer of the list is none other than the Segway-challenged Piers Morgan himself: View this image ›
dailymail.co.uk ID: 10530852 4. Once the former reality show contestant realized he wrote the glowing words about Rowling, he — of course — claimed he knew that all along (two hours later): View this image ›
Twitter: @piersmorgan ID: 10530922 5. Mmmhm. View this image ›
Paramount Pictures ID: 10530949 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
